file_content.text:
The Empire requires all able-bodied citizens to assist with the war effort. All citizens are expected to learn special skills to gather raw materials for crafting, craft new modifications for weapons and armor, or send your companions on missions for the glory of the Empire.
Locate your nearest crafting, gathering, or mission trainer immediately and help the Empire win the war.

In a galaxy torn by war, many battles cannot be won with the strength of one hero alone. You will need allies in your fight to claim victory for the Empire. Group Finder will match you with a group of other heroes and transport you to the front-lines of conflicts across the Galaxy.
Click the top-left icon located on your mini-map to open Group Finder. Select your role, and then join the queue for a Flashpoint. Complete the Flashpoint with the group you are assigned. You must have all available Flashpoints selected to be eligible for the daily reward.

The Minister of War has mustered a new swift action division to deliver swift and decisive response to emerging threats across the galaxy.
By volunteering you will be expected to deploy to warzones and battle for victory against the opposing forces.
- Click the Warzone Icon on your Mini-Map. - Queue for a Warzone and Complete It.

Aid the Empire by completing three of the following missions on the master difficulty mode.
[MASTER] Flashpoint: The Black Talon [MASTER] Flashpoint: Boarding Party [MASTER] Flashpoint: The Foundry [MASTER] Flashpoint: Directive 7 [MASTER] Flashpoint: The Battle of Ilum [MASTER] Flashpoint: The False Emperor [MASTER] Flashpoint: Kaon Under Siege [MASTER] Flashpoint: Lost Island [MASTER] Flashpoint: Czerka Corporate Labs [MASTER] Flashpoint: Czerka Core Meltdown [MASTER] Flashpoint: Athiss [MASTER] Flashpoint: Cademimu [MASTER] Flashpoint: Hammer Station [MASTER] Flashpoint: Mandalorian Raiders [MASTER] Flashpoint: Red Reaper [MASTER] Flashpoint: Assault on Tython [MASTER] Flashpoint: Korriban Incursion [MASTER] Flashpoint: Depths of Manaan [MASTER] Flashpoint: Legacy of the Rakata [MASTER] Flashpoint: Blood Hunt [MASTER] Flashpoint: Battle of Rishi [MASTER] Flashpoint: Crisis on Umbara [MASTER] Flashpoint: A Traitor Among the Chiss

In a galaxy torn by war, many battles cannot be won with the strength of one hero alone. You will need allies in your fight to claim victory for the Empire. Group Finder will match you with a group of other heroes and transport you to the front-lines of conflicts across the Galaxy.
Click the top-left icon located on your mini-map to open Group Finder. Select your role, and then join the queue for a Flashpoint. You must have all available Flashpoints selected to be eligible for the daily reward.

Aid the Empire by completing the following repeatable missions five times.
[VETERAN] Flashpoint: Blood Hunt [VETERAN] Flashpoint: Battle of Rishi [VETERAN] Flashpoint: Czerka Corporate Labs [VETERAN] Flashpoint: Czerka Core Meltdown [VETERAN] Flashpoint: Assault of Tython [VETERAN] Flashpoint: Korriban Incursion [VETERAN] Flashpoint: Depths of Manaan [VETERAN] Flashpoint: Legacy of the Rakata [VETERAN] Flashpoint: Athiss [VETERAN] Flashpoint: Cademimu [VETERAN] Flashpoint: Hammer Station [VETERAN] Flashpoint: Mandalorian Raiders [VETERAN] Flashpoint: Red Reaper [VETERAN] Flashpoint: Crisis on Umbara [VETERAN] Flashpoint: A Traitor Among the Chiss

Aid the Empire by completing a Tactical Flashpoint via Group Finder while eligible for the daily reward.
Tactical Flashpoints are action-packed, role-neutral instances balanced for a group of any four players. Players below the maximum level will be bolstered to the appropriate power level.

In a galaxy torn by war, many battles cannot be won with the strength of one hero alone. You will need allies in your fight to defend the Alliance.
Aid the Alliance by completing the following repeatable missions five times.
[VETERAN] Uprising: Crimson Fang [VETERAN] Uprising: Done & Dusted [VETERAN] Uprising: Firefrost [VETERAN] Uprising: Fractured [VETERAN] Uprising: Inferno [VETERAN] Uprising: Landing Party [VETERAN] Uprising: Trial & Error [VETERAN] Uprising: Trench Runner [VETERAN] Uprising: Divided We Fall [VETERAN] Uprising: Destroyer of Worlds

In a galaxy torn by war, many battles cannot be won with the strength of one hero alone. You will need allies in your fight to defend the Alliance.
Aid the Alliance by completing the following repeatable missions five times.
[STORY] Uprising: Crimson Fang [STORY] Uprising: Done & Dusted [STORY] Uprising: Firefrost [STORY] Uprising: Fractured [STORY] Uprising: Inferno [STORY] Uprising: Landing Party [STORY] Uprising: Trial & Error [STORY] Uprising: Trench Runner [STORY] Uprising: Divided We Fall [STORY] Uprising: Destroyer of Worlds

In a galaxy torn by war, many battles cannot be won with the strength of one hero alone. You will need allies in your fight to defend the Alliance.
Aid the Alliance by completing one of the following repeatable missions.
[MASTER] Uprising: Crimson Fang [MASTER] Uprising: Done & Dusted [MASTER] Uprising: Firefrost [MASTER] Uprising: Fractured [MASTER] Uprising: Inferno [MASTER] Uprising: Landing Party [MASTER] Uprising: Trial & Error [MASTER] Uprising: Trench Runner [MASTER] Uprising: Divided We Fall [MASTER] Uprising: Destroyer of Worlds

Enemy forces grapple for control over multiple sectors of the galaxy. We need to claim these contended zones in order to turn the tide of war.
Requesting additional personnel to aid in the capture of these valuable locations.
- Click the Mission Log icon on your menu bar. - Click the Conquest Tab. - Complete the objectives to earn Conquest Points. - Earn the full value required to complete the Conquest!
